Final: Houston defeats the Angels 6-5.
Kyle Tucker doubled to right field, Altuve scored to give the Astros a 6-5 lead in the top of the ninth inning.
David Mackinnon knocks in two with a single to left field and Marsh scores on a passed ball. Angels tie it 5-5 in the seventh inning.
Brandon Marsh is hit by a pitch with bases loaded. Luis Rengifo scores to cut the Astros lead 5-2 in the bottom of the seventh inning.
Jose Altuve singled to center field  scoring J.J. Matijevic. Jake Myers came around to score after the ball went passed Monte Harrison. Astors lead the Angels 5-1 in the top of the sixth inning.
Jose Marte has replaced Syndergaard in the top of the fifth inning.
Mike Trout has been removed from the game with upper back spasms.
Jared Walsh grounded out to first base and Micheal Stefanic scored from third base to cut the Astors lead 2-1.
Gracia is in trouble in the first inning. He has loaded the bases with three walks.
Aldemys Diaz opens the scoring with a two-run home run in the top of the first inning. Astors lead the Angels 2-0.
